column2:
"<%me>!
I wanted to see you again!"

"<%me>, listen!
Sir Saga has been
terrible with me!"

"Putting me through such
intense training without any rest,
my body is at its limit."

"...Yet you do have
stamina to go running to greet <%me>."

"That was but a sudden burst.
Aah, my body's starting
to feel fragile again..."

"Enough.
You are annoying
<%me> here."
"So harsh! Unemotional as usual!"

"Aah~ If only instead of
Saga I could be partnered
up with <%me>."

"... I understand.
If that's what it takes, it can't be helped.
Would you rather try it that way?"

"I've reached the limits of
what I can teach, I'm afraid."

"I'll fill up the documents.
Your training will remain the same,
but you'll go with a new partner."

"Ah? N-no...
Sir Saga? What are you..."

"<%me>, my apologies.
From now on, you'll have to take
care of it. I'm counting on you."

"Ho-hold on! Wait!
Sir Saga, I was jesting! A joke!
I'm sure\u3000you understand!"

"... Don't go hard on yourself, Katori.
With this much training,
your body's in a lot of pain, isn't it?"

"Up until this moment, I put you
through too much. Forgive me."

"Such kind words! But how!?
They feel like an arrow
piercing through my chest!"

"No, this is wrong! I can do it!
I can keep going! Actually,
I haven't done enough yet!"

"... Does that mean you still
want me to train you?"
"But of course!"

"Even if you feel you're dying? Even after
your body starts crying, you'll keep going?"
"I'm completely prepared!"
"You don't really mean those words."
"I certainly do!"
"I see..."

"Then I won't hold back. Until now
this has only been a warm up.
The real thing starts now."

"With our next training,
I'll test your new resolve!"

"I have already prepared it.
C'mon, let's go."

"... Excuse me?
Already prepared, you say?"

"B-but, hold on, Sir Saga.
Shouldn't we start
taking it easy...?"
"I knew you didn't mean those words."

"It is true my morale was high
throughout the conversation, b-but...!"
